description: Email templates for User Management operations.  The email template file contains a sender, subject, and contents section for customization.  Macros are replaced in the email before it is sent.  Macros are described below and must start and end with @ sign.

required.description: The group name.  The group that the end user was added to or removed from.
A link to the login page.  When a user is created, then can click the link to login.
The user's password.  When an admin creates a new user, the end user is email their temporary password.
The attributes changed in a modify user operation displayed as a bunch of html table rows.
The days before the password is expired.
A link to the reset password page for password expiration notifications.
A link to the change password page for password expiration notifications.
The date when the user password is expired.
If password reset for user self care is enabled for the tenant, the value is inherit, otherwise the value is none.
If password reset for user self care is not enabled for the tenant, the value is inherit, otherwise the value is none.
